completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) X))
        (apply (update_color O))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) Y))
        (apply (update_color X))
    )
)
